solargraph.logLevel.description: Level of debug info to log. `warn` is least and `debug` is most.

solargraph.transport.description: The type of transport to use.

solargraph.externalServer.description: The host and port to use for external transports. (Ignored for stdio and socket transports.)

solargraph.commandPath.description: Path to the solargraph command.  Set this to an absolute path to select from multiple installed Ruby versions.

solargraph.useBundler.description: Use `bundle exec` to run solargraph. (If this is true, the solargraph.commandPath setting is ignored.)

solargraph.autoformat.description: Enable automatic formatting while typing (WARNING: experimental)

solargraph.bundlerPath.description: Path to the bundle executable, defaults to 'bundle'. Needs to be an absolute path for the 'bundle' exec/shim

solargraph.checkGemVersion.description: Automatically check if a new version of the Solargraph gem is available.
